tidbits.title: Vast Wilderness
tidbits.description: Canada is known for its vast wilderness, including stunning national parks like Banff and Jasper, offering diverse landscapes from mountains to tundra.

tidbits.title: Cultural Mosaic
tidbits.description: Canada embraces diversity, with a multicultural society, indigenous heritage, and a reputation for inclusivity, fostering a rich tapestry of traditions and cuisines.

tidbits.title: Hockey Passion
tidbits.description: Hockey is a national passion in Canada, deeply ingrained in the country's culture, with the NHL (National Hockey League) and international tournaments like the Stanley Cup.
